definitions.definition: To inquire into or study in order to ascertain facts or information .
examples: to investigate the causes of natural phenomena
He was asked to investigate a robbery.

definitions.definition: To examine , look into, or scrutinize in order to discover something hidden or secret .
To conduct an inquiry or examination .

main_definition: ( transitive ) To inquire into or study in order to ascertain facts or information .
secondary_definitions: ( transitive ) To examine , look into, or scrutinize in order to discover something hidden or secret .
( intransitive ) To conduct an inquiry or examination .
